item.title: LCID
item.description: score:51 Chances: Lucid Group (LCID) has received a Buy alert from Motley Fool on Monday. Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: LCID), setting new standards for luxury electric experience with the Lucid Air, selected to Car and Driver’s 10Best list for 2024. Lucid produced 2,391 vehicles during Q4 and delivered 1,734 vehicles during the same period.
